name: ScoreBank
description:
Gameplay

Destroy enemies by touching them or shooting them with the laser, collect points and buy cards to boost your stats. The game is very short (3-5 minutes) since I literally made it in 1-2 days.

Controls

Movement - aim with mouse, move with W

Shoot - Left Mouse Button /  E (note: laser works half the time)

Accelerate - Right Mouse Button / Shift

Swap - Q

Pause - Escape
